A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm highly suspicious of the Audience Score after having seen TLJ. I loathed the JJ Abrams FA which was boring fan service at best. I walked into TLJ expecting more of the same but left happier than I've been since walking out of ROTJ as a kid. I've seen every SW movie in the theater and plan to see TLJ again this weekend. It's not a perfect movie\, by any stretch\, and some of the film should have been edited out\, but overall\, it's amazing.
